verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w looked|strong="G1492"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w lo|strong="G2400"\w*, a \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* \w Sion|strong="G4622"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* an \w hundred|strong="G1540"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \add and\add* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Fatherâ€™s|strong="G3962"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w foreheads|strong="G3359"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w waters|strong="G5204"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w thunder|strong="G1027"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of \w harpers|strong="G2790"\w* \w harping|strong="G2789"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w harps|strong="G2788"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w sung|strong="G0103"\w* as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* a \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w song|strong="G5603"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2226"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w learn|strong="G3129"\w* \w that|strong="G1487"\w* \w song|strong="G5603"\w* \w but|strong="G3361"\w* the \w hundred|strong="G1540"\w* \add and\add* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \add and\add* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* were \w redeemed|strong="G0059"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* they \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w were|strong="G3435"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w defiled|strong="G3435"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w virgins|strong="G3933"\w*. \w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* they \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w follow|strong="G0190"\w* the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w* \w whithersoever|strong="G3699"\w* he \w goeth|strong="G5217"\w*. \w These|strong="G3778"\w* were \w redeemed|strong="G0059"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* among \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \add being\add* the \w firstfruits|strong="G0536"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* was \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w guile|strong="G1388"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w are|strong="G1526"\w* without \w fault|strong="G0299"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w fly|strong="G4072"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the midst of \w heaven|strong="G3321"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* the \w everlasting|strong="G0166"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* to \w preach|strong="G2097"\w* unto \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w kindred|strong="G5443"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w Fear|strong="G5399"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* the \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w* is \w come|strong="G2064"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2281"\w* the \w fountains|strong="G4077"\w* of \w waters|strong="G5204"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Babylon|strong="G0897"\w* is \w fallen|strong="G4098"\w*, is \w fallen|strong="G4098"\w*, that \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* she \w made|strong="G4222"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* \w drink|strong="G4222"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* of the \w wrath|strong="G2372"\w* of \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w image|strong="G1504"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \add his\add* \w mark|strong="G5480"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w forehead|strong="G3359"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*,

The \w same|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w drink|strong="G4095"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* of the \w wrath|strong="G2372"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is poured \w out|strong="G2767"\w* without \w mixture|strong="G0194"\w* \w into|strong="G1722"\w* the \w cup|strong="G4221"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w indignation|strong="G3709"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he shall be \w tormented|strong="G0928"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brimstone|strong="G2303"\w* in the \w presence|strong="G1799"\w* of the \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* in the presence \w of|strong="G1799"\w* the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w smoke|strong="G2586"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w torment|strong="G0929"\w* ascendeth \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w rest|strong="G0372"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* nor \w night|strong="G3571"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w image|strong="G1504"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w whosoever|strong="G5100"\w* \w receiveth|strong="G2983"\w* the \w mark|strong="G5480"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*.

\w Here|strong="G5602"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w patience|strong="G5281"\w* of the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*: \w here|strong="G5602"\w* \add are\add* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* that \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* the \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w Write|strong="G1125"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \add are\add* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w die|strong="G0599"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* from \w henceforth|strong="G0534"\w*: \w Yea|strong="G3483"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they may \w rest|strong="G0373"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w labours|strong="G2873"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* do \w follow|strong="G0190"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w looked|strong="G1492"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w behold|strong="G2400"\w* a \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w* \add one\add* \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* like \w unto|strong="G3664"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w* a \w golden|strong="G5552"\w* \w crown|strong="G4735"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* a \w sharp|strong="G3691"\w* \w sickle|strong="G1407"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w came|strong="G1831"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w*, \w crying|strong="G2896"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* to \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w*, Thrust \w in|strong="G3992"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w sickle|strong="G1407"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w reap|strong="G2325"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* the \w time|strong="G5610"\w* is \w come|strong="G2064"\w* for \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* to \w reap|strong="G2325"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* the \w harvest|strong="G2326"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* is \w ripe|strong="G3583"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w* \w thrust|strong="G0906"\w* in \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w sickle|strong="G1407"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* was \w reaped|strong="G2325"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w came|strong="G1831"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* a \w sharp|strong="G3691"\w* \w sickle|strong="G1407"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w came|strong="G1831"\w* out \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w altar|strong="G2379"\w*, which \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cried|strong="G5455"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w cry|strong="G2906"\w* to \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w had|strong="G2192"\w* the \w sharp|strong="G3691"\w* \w sickle|strong="G1407"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Thrust \w in|strong="G3992"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w sharp|strong="G3691"\w* \w sickle|strong="G1407"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gather|strong="G5166"\w* the \w clusters|strong="G1009"\w* of the \w vine|strong="G1093"\w* of the earth; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w grapes|strong="G4718"\w* are fully \w ripe|strong="G0187"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* thrust \w in|strong="G0906"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w sickle|strong="G1407"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gathered|strong="G5166"\w* the \w vine|strong="G0288"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \add it\add* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w winepress|strong="G3025"\w* of the \w wrath|strong="G2372"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w winepress|strong="G3025"\w* was \w trodden|strong="G3961"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* \w came|strong="G1831"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w winepress|strong="G3025"\w*, even \w unto|strong="G0891"\w* the \w horse|strong="G2462"\w* \w bridles|strong="G5469"\w*, by the space \w of|strong="G0575"\w* a \w thousand|strong="G5507"\w* \add and\add* six \w hundred|strong="G1812"\w* \w furlongs|strong="G4712"\w*.
